doc.field: Increased incidence of retinopathy of prematurity and evolving treatment modalities at a Canadian tertiary centre.,"Some studies have suggested that diabetes and XRCC gene may be risk factors for glaucoma; however, no studies have focused on the interaction between the XRCC gene and T2DM with respect to POAG risk. Therefore, the present study evaluated the initiative gene-environment interactions in POAG. "
